channel.title: I will be holding Java classes
channel.description:
You must be willing to learn JAVA. This will have nothing to do with private servers. You mis-behave (talk when I say not to, etc.) and you're out. Why? Because I'm doing this for free.
I will be teaching about all 11 data types, basic conventions, using OOP for your advantage (learning about objects, etc.), many useful classes like Scanner, streams, brief 2d overview, general IO, and finally you will make your own little program.
Classes will be held without schedule, and will be made in a chat room on MSN. Post here and/or contact me for details. I am doing this to actually teach the Moparscape community some Java, and better my knowledge as well through teaching.
I will be taking 5 students. Post an application.
